item.description:
WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: The grassy hill across the street from Plymouth Rock overlooks Plymouth Bay, the rock, people, and is a generally pleasant place to sketch. Parking is easily available in Plymouth Center, but usually you will have to walk 1/2 mile to get to the site, so pack light.

SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS: None

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. In the center, take a right towards the water, and you will come to the large grassy hill overlooking the water.  We will be at the point across from the rock.

RSVP POLICY: If there are 3 or less artists RSVPd for the event, the event is subject to cancellation within 12 hours of the event. We apologize for any inconvenience.

DIRECTIONS: Follow directions to Plymouth Center.  I park by taking a right at the south end of main street, a right at the lights next to a gift shop.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
                        Mosquito repellant,  Paper towels,  Sweater, water, food

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

CONTACT:
Michael Emerald, CFA
Organizer
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Plymouth Rock overlook, Plymouth, MA
